extension.description:
PayPlansContentSeller :
1) Through this plugin you can control the display of content according to users subscriptions and subscription status.
2) Also have capability to process tag system
3) You can use following parameters into tags:- article_id, plan_id, expiration_type, expiration_time, recurrence_count,
trial_price_1, trial_time_1, trial_price_2, trial_time_2, price.
4) For further details you can follow documentation of content seller plugin.
